property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Moon Market merchants sell a bottled scent to cutpurses and other criminals. Those doused in the liquid become "griffin bait."

property.name: Rules
property.value: %, Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You say that I am two-faced? Enough with the flattery. We have business to conduct."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Smogsteed Rider attacks, each other attacking creature gains fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An entire order of mages who draw their power from Ravnica's smog? Yet another indicator of our world's decay."—Dravash, dowsing shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate 1% (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Pyromatics deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, its controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some claim it's a failed Simic experiment, others say a Golgari creation. Both guilds deny all responsibility, while secretly studying its strange virulence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (đ can be paid with either # or %.) When Petrahydrox becomes the target of a spell or ability, return Petrahydrox to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It departs through the streets' fissures with a sound like gravel pouring into a pond.

property.value: If Leyline of the Meek is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Creature tokens get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We mourn our dead. We shroud our dead. We bury our dead. Too often, it seems, we must kill our dead again."—Grazda, veteran armorer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all creatures you control. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The call came, spell-borne through mortar and stone to the ear of every soldier. The call came, and the advantage was ours."—Lodusz, captain of the watch

property.value: Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Orzhov Euthanist enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

property.value: When Ghost Council of Orzhova enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. 1, Sacrifice a creature: Exile Ghost Council of Orzhova. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.value: Flying 1%: Torch Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drakes? Bah Things that breathe don't interest me. It breathes fire, you say? Well, that's a different story"—Zataz, Izzet clockwork artificer

property.value: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet learn something from every lesson they teach.

property.value: You gain 1 life for each player. Haunt (When this spell card is put into a graveyard after resolving, exile it haunting target creature.) When the creature Benediction of Moons haunts dies, you gain 1 life for each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each land gets +2/+2 as long as it's a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some gardeners sing to plants. I tell them stories—stories of how they once ruled the world, of the mortals who destroyed their kind, and of revenge."—Bougrat, druid of the Cult of Yore

property.value: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The snap of sinew. The crunch of bone. A cry for mercy. These are the music of the Gruul.

property.value: "Look to the old tomes, those bound in hides and written in yarberry ink. They hold the spells that can free us of the clutter of modern magecraft."—Dravash, dowsing shaman

property.value: 3: Feral Animist gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He chanted over a pot of boiling blood and honey. His brain buzzed like a nest of hornets, and his muscles rippled with the might of the bear.

property.value: "We respect all lifeforms, but this one we respect from a distance."—Mandor, Selesnya ranger

property.value: Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be."—Agosto, Azorius imperator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, if that spell targets only Ink-Treader Nephilim, copy the spell for each other creature that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it awoke, the mirrors of the world reflected only darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is the ultimate mindless destroyer, capable of power and ferocity no army can match, and the Gruul follow its example."—Trigori, Azorius senator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Glint-Eye Nephilim deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards. 1, Discard a card: Glint-Eye Nephilim gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it awoke, it shook the plane with the thunder of its craving.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of Singularity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. All nonland permanents are legendary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a blue spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn. Whenever you cast a red spell, Tibor and Lumia deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tracing the horizon in a dance of wind and fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of Lightning is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay 1. If you do, Leyline of Lightning deals 1 damage to target player.

property.value: "The blazekite is a simple concept, really—just a vehicular application of dragscoop ionics and electropropulsion magnetronics."—Juzba, Izzet tinker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put X 1/1 white Pegasus creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield, where X is your life total.

property.value: "When you hear thunder on a cloudless day, take cover and brace for the coming of the storm herd."—Skotov, Tin Street basket vendor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature attacks you, its controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All that remains when the fog finishes are neat piles of polished bones, like acid-etched glass. Orzhov servants collect them to make altar chimes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy each creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who truly runs this city? Look to the sky on hallowed days, and see whose sigil is stamped clearly onto the heavens."—Vuliev of the Ghost Council

property.value: The clouds grew thick, and then they grew teeth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So wondrous to behold, so delicate and finely crafted—and yet, such a pleasure to smash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lurking below the current, she thirsts until others come to drink.

property.value: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cremation of the dead is not a religious ritual in Ravnica. It's a business designed to keep the Golgari from growing in numbers.

property.value: Trample Whenever Borborygmos deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.value: "It's easy to see why those Gruul dirtbags follow him—the only orders he gives are ‘Crush them' and ‘We eat'"—Teysa

property.value: When Ogre Savant enters the battlefield, if # was spent to cast Ogre Savant, return target creature to its owner's hand.

Search that player's library for a card with the same name and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Defense is as much a part of war as offense, the shield as important a tool as the sword."—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Garb is for common folk. I prefer to wear insight and zeal, ambition and flame."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ulasht, the Hate Seed enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other red creature you control and a +1/+1 counter on it for each other green creature you control. 1, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Ulasht: Choose one — Ulasht deals 1 damage to target creature; or put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Douse in Gloom deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.value: Orzhov prisoners are steeped in a blackened brew that robs their souls of strength. Patriarchs drink that brew to extend their own lives.

property.value: @, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature can't attack this turn.

property.value: Rakdos cultists hanged her for sport in the township square. Her ghost now stands vigil at what has become known as the Tree of Weeping.

property.value: He ensures not only whether but also when and where the lightning strikes twice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One moment, conscious only of a sense of repose. The next moment, hearing the trudge of his own footsteps. He sighed and squinted into the glare ahead.

property.value: Choose one — Draw X cards; or Invoke the Firemind deals X damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To those in tune with the Firemind, there is no difference between knowledge and flame.

property.value: 2, `: Exile target card from a graveyard. 2@$, `, Sacrifice Moratorium Stone: Exile target nonland card from a graveyard, all other cards from graveyards with the same name as that card, and all permanents with that name.

property.value: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I ran the experiment through the brain of a schizophrenic lab-goblin. My burners' flames fell asleep while the beakers jumped about and shattered. Success"—Myznar, Izzet psychomancer

property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Souls of the Faultless is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life and attacking player loses that much life.

property.value: "More horrible than their empty forms are their noble eyes. I dare not strike."—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

property.value: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Abyssal Nocturnus gets +2/+2 and gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.value: "I fear to keep an open mind, for there are those who would use it as a door to my soul."—Voka Schlak,Mauzam Asylum inmate, diary

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have creatures you control assign their combat damage this turn as though they weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instinct blood-tinted his world until he could see only one thing clearly: his prey.

property.value: Loyal in battle, hearty in stew.

property.value: Skyrider Trainee has flying as long as it's enchanted.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course I plan on going up. Kang here is the most trusted 'fin on the squad. Afraid? Me? No, I'm just . . . waiting for the right wind conditions."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The eyes let flow with tears, then blood, then the very soul—the whole wrung inside out, dripping down into the blackened puddle of the past.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I thought of fate as an iron lattice, intricate but rigidly unchangeable. That was until some force bent fate's bars to spare my life."—Ilromov, traveling storyteller

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rauck-Chauv's like a holiday Only it isn't on the calendars, and instead of dancing you knock people flat, and instead of giving gifts you break stuff."

property.value: Target player discards a card. Haunt (When this spell card is put into a graveyard after resolving, exile it haunting target creature.) When the creature Cry of Contrition haunts dies, target player discards a card.

property.value: When it awoke, it shattered the hillsides to make way for its passage.

property.value: Whenever Yore-Tiller Nephilim attacks, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it awoke, the worms of the earth hissed in a chorus of beckoning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They inflict pain to forget their own and break foes to feel whole.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Goblin Flectomancer: You may change the targets of target instant or sorcery spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rerouting magic through a goblin's brain is the surest way to throw it wildly off course.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Simic use the claws as scalpels, while the Rakdos use them for tattooing and torture. The Gruul use them to pick their teeth after lunching on the rest of the carcass.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Gelectrode deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may untap Gelectrode.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Diametrically opposing energies in self-sealed plasmodermic bubbles make great pets"—Trivaz, Izzet mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sky Swallower enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of all other permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Would you trade the world for such a pet?

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The chant was interrupted, the components cooked, and Zok worried that it was his brain he smelled smoking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add 1 to your mana pool. %^, `: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This palace will be our fire-spit, and roasted prince our victory meal. Send in the torch-pigs"—Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: (đ can be paid with either # or %.) Flying Each instant and sorcery spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Orzhov Pontiff enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, choose one — Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn; or creatures you don't control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov run a construction unit whose only business is rebuilding the wreckage left in the wake of wurms. When business is slow, they pay Golgari carnomancers to lure the wurms to the surface.

property.name: Rules
property.value: $, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy each creature with the same converted mana cost as the sacrificed creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our fealty to guilds dooms us. The old gods shall resurface. Our skins will wave upon the guild-masts over emptied streets, and our bones will clatter in the wind."—Ilromov, traveling storyteller

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Tin Street to the Outcast Mansions, she walks unbidden and unbound, her graceful silence never shaken by the riot of city life around her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Bioplasm attacks, exile the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, Bioplasm gets +X/+Y until end of turn, where X is the exiled creature card's power and Y is its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

property.name: Rules

Put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orzhov churches don't pass the plate for collection. They charge for admission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has first strike. 1$: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shadow lances are crafted from harvested souls. The more wicked the sinner, the keener the blade.

property.value: Whenever Ætherplasm blocks a creature, you may return Ætherplasm to its owner's hand. If you do, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield blocking that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fickle form holds hints of a thousand former identities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Quyzl was told by his mentor to "make more time" for his studies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant green creature Enchanted creature gets +6/+6. ^^^, Sacrifice Wurmweaver Coil: Put a 6/6 green Wurm creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some use magic to spy through walls. Others use it to crush them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate # (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Tap target permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature with flying loses flying until end of turn. Crash Landing deals damage to that creature equal to the number of Forests you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The other guilds think they're untouchable. It's time we brought them back down to earth."—Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "`: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target attacking or blocking creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Steel rusts. Arrows break. But righteousness is always strong, always sharp."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Steamcore Weird enters the battlefield, if % was spent to cast Steamcore Weird, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like many Izzet creations, weirds are based on wild contradictions yet somehow manage to work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Burning-Tree Shaman deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul shamans are bent on punishing the civilized. Any act more complex than rubbing sticks together or eating with utensils is met with the stinging burn of their magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) %, `: Attacking creatures get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is Rabble-Rouser's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next sorcery card you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skilled Izzet chronarch can carry out an epic vendetta between the fall of one hourglass grain and the next.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Crystal Seer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order. 4#: Return Crystal Seer to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Surprise is a useless, untidy emotion—the plaything of goblins and fools."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate 2# (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate % (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In secrecy is strength. None can oppose one who cannot be found."—Szadek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Which is worse—the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped. When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. `: Add #% to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile each creature you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I watched its blade swing through me, but I was hollow, empty. I saw its face contort in rage but could not hear it snarl."—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Exhumer Thrull enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gruul Scrapper enters the battlefield, if % was spent to cast Gruul Scrapper, it gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Gruul aren't satisfied with just smashing things. They continue smashing other things with the things they just smashed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1 and have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first blow is the most important. It often negates the need for a second."—Agrus Kos

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Đ can be paid with either % or ^.) 3%, Sacrifice a land: Gruul Guildmage deals 2 damage to target player. 3^: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 1. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ever try to count hyperactive schoolchildren while someone shouts random numbers in your ear? It's like that."—Geetra, frustrated mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Ĕ can be paid with either @ or $.) Flying Whenever Mourning Thrull deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During their ascent to spirithood, patriarchs of Orzhova shed both flesh and emotion. This earthly slag is collected and formed into thrulls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield tapped. When Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. `: Add @$ to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Đ can be paid with either % or ^.) Sacrifice Wild Cantor: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are the voice of the wild, crying out with nature's fury and bringing forth its primeval might.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of Lifeforce is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Creature spells can't be countered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) As Order of the Stars enters the battlefield, choose a color. Order of the Stars has protection from the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As stoic as the marble halls, as unblinking as the stars upon their shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vedalken Plotter enters the battlefield, exchange control of target land you control and target land an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fair? At what point in our negotiations did you convince yourself my goal was to be fair?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have no need for military might. We wield two of the sharpest swords ever forged: Faith in our left hand, Wealth in our right."—Vuliev of the Ghost Council

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Rumbling Slum deals 1 damage to each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov contract the Izzet to animate slum districts and banish them to the wastes. The Gruul adopt them and send them back to the city for vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Exile two creature cards from your graveyard: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Piece the tragic notes together and is it not a melody?"—Teysa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It tracks its victims by the scent of their breath, preferring to dine on those who recently ate well.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "`: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player." 1#: Return Hypervolt Grasp to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1. Whenever a creature you control that's enchanted becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Parallectric Feedback deals damage to target spell's controller equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can't have so many people living so close together, all practicing so much magic, and not expect some feedback."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Absolver Thrull enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (`: Add @ or $ to your mana pool.) As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Godless Shrine enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Stratozeppelid can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The "Days of Darkness" mark the stratozeppelids' annual migration, when for five days they blot out the sun and trumpet their passing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The soldier moved with fluid poise, his awareness extending far beyond five senses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Living Inferno deals damage equal to its power divided as you choose among any number of target creatures. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to Living Inferno.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Dune-Brood Nephilim deals combat damage to a player, put a 1/1 colorless Sand creature token onto the battlefield for each land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it awoke, it spawned nameless thousands to herald its arrival.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wreak Havoc can't be countered by spells or abilities. Destroy target artifact or land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Revenant Patriarch enters the battlefield, if @ was spent to cast it, target player skips his or her next combat phase. Revenant Patriarch can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Golgari raise the bodies of their dead to serve. We raise the spirits of our dead to lead."

property.name: Rules
property.value: ^, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No more wretched fate is there than to waste away. If you are slain, your ghost may at least avenge itself upon your killer. But what release is there for one slain by Time?"—Ilromov, traveling storyteller

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance 4@: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your signet is no symbol of power. It marks only your need for numbers to aid you. What do you do, guild-rat, now that you face my blade alone?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice three white creatures: Exile target creature. Whenever another black creature you control dies, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike 3^: Ghor-Clan Bloodscale gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At mealtimes, the Gruul customarily omit such niceties as using forks or killing the entrée.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add 1 to your mana pool. 3@$, `: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike most churches, at Orzhova it's best to pray before you arrive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Name a card. Until your next turn, the named card can't be played. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orzhov faithful file past to have their minds purged of "impure" desires. There, the guiltwardens eliminate any thoughts of hope or self-sufficiency.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Silhana Ledgewalker can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Street folk call them "spire mice," but behind the mockery is an unspoken envy of the ledgewalkers' skill at avoiding harm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate 1# (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But then . . . oh, but . . . which means . . . which would lead to . . . exactly"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Creatures with power less than Skarrgan Pit-Skulk's power can't block it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) 1, Sacrifice Skarrgan Skybreaker: Skarrgan Skybreaker deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sky isn't falling—it's being thrown at us"—Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

property.name: Rules
property.value: %: Gruul Nodorog can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Petting the nodorog—Gruul expression meaning"making a really big mistake"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Looking out the great windows of Vitu-Ghazi at the foundry stacks belching their smoke to the sky, I wonder when the sky will take its vengeance."—Heruj, Selesnya initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: X, `: Each creature with converted mana cost X can't attack or block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: " . . . and you must also apply for an application license, file documents 136(iv) and 22-C and -D in triplicate, pay all requisite fees, request a . . ."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Shrieking Grotesque enters the battlefield, if $ was spent to cast it, target player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orzhov mage-sculptors bring their stone to life before they carve it. The shrieking begins as soon as the mouths are formed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two times the size, four times the smell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) As Silhana Starfletcher enters the battlefield, choose a color. `: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In light he finds both gift and weapon.
